brandwave.title: Brandwave
brandwave.subtitle: Transforming Customer Engagement Through Micro-Influencer Marketing
brandwave.overview: Brandwave is a revolutionary platform that transforms how brands connect with customers through micro-influencer marketing. It enables users to discover exclusive offers, promote brands, and earn rewards while helping businesses increase their reach and engagement.
brandwave.role: As the lead Flutter developer, I spearheaded the development of Brandwave's mobile application from concept to launch. I collaborated closely with the marketing team to implement micro-influencer features and integrated payment gateways for seamless transactions.
features: Direct Offer Discovery: Implemented an intuitive interface for discovering deals and promotions
Micro-Influencer Marketing: Developed tools for users to promote brands and earn rewards
Digital Coupons: Created a system for sharing experiences and earning real rewards
ShopNgo: Integrated QR code scanning for instant purchases
Delivery Services: Added convenient delivery options from partnered stores
technologies: QR Code Scanner – For ShopNgo feature
outcome: Created a seamless platform for micro-influencer marketing
Enhanced user engagement through reward-based promotions
Streamlined the shopping experience with digital coupons

coincrowd.title: CoinCrowd
coincrowd.subtitle: Revolutionizing Web3 Payments & Authentication
coincrowd.overview: CoinCrowd is an innovative Web3 platform that simplifies cryptocurrency transactions and wallet management. It integrates fiat-to-crypto payments, secure wallet authentication, and real-time blockchain interactions, making crypto adoption more accessible and user-friendly.
coincrowd.role: As a part-time contractor, I led the Web3 integration and frontend development of CoinCrowd. I designed and implemented the secure wallet authentication system using Web3Auth, integrated MoonPay for fiat-to-crypto transactions, and developed real-time blockchain interaction features.
features: Web3 Authentication: Integrated Web3Auth for seamless, keyless logins
Crypto Transactions: Implemented MoonPay for fiat-to-crypto purchases
Wallet Management: Developed secure wallet creation and management features
Real-time Updates: Created live blockchain interaction monitoring
outcome: Improved user engagement with intuitive Web3 experience
Enhanced security and compliance for user funds
Scaled to support thousands of active users

otuhrplus.title: OTU HRPlus
otuhrplus.subtitle: Smart HR & Payroll Management System
otuhrplus.overview: OTU HRPlus is an advanced HR and payroll management system designed to streamline employee management, payroll processing, and attendance tracking for businesses of all sizes.
otuhrplus.role: As the lead Flutter developer, I architected and developed the complete HR management system. I designed the database schema for employee records, implemented biometric attendance integration, and created automated payroll calculation algorithms.
features: Employee Management: Developed comprehensive employee record management
Payroll Processing: Implemented automated salary calculations and tax deductions
Attendance Tracking: Created real-time biometric and manual attendance systems
Performance Management: Built tools for performance reviews and goal tracking
Access Control: Implemented secure role-based access for different user types
outcome: Increased HR efficiency through automation
Reduced manual errors in payroll processing
Improved employee engagement with self-service features

otuindia.title: OTU India
otuindia.subtitle: Smart Job Portal for Job Seekers & Employers
otuindia.overview: OTU India is a modern job portal that connects job seekers with employers through AI-powered job matching, application tracking, and seamless hiring solutions.
otuindia.role: As the lead Flutter developer, I designed and implemented the AI-powered job matching system and real-time application tracking features. I developed the resume builder with dynamic templates and integrated push notifications for job alerts.
features: Smart Job Search: Implemented AI-powered job recommendations
Application Process: Created one-click job applications with tracking
Resume Builder: Developed tools for professional resume creation
Employer Dashboard: Built comprehensive job posting and candidate management
Notifications: Integrated real-time updates for applications and interviews
outcome: Enabled faster job searches with AI recommendations
Increased employer engagement with streamlined tools
Improved job seeker experience with easy applications

xlschool.title: XLSchool
xlschool.subtitle: Comprehensive School Management Solution
xlschool.overview: XLSchool is a feature-rich school management system that digitalizes and streamlines academic and administrative operations for educational institutions.
xlschool.role: As a Flutter developer, I designed and implemented the school management system's core features. I developed the student attendance tracking system with biometric integration, created the exam management module with automated grading, and implemented secure fee payment processing.
features: Student Management: Developed digital record-keeping systems
Attendance System: Created real-time attendance monitoring
Exam Management: Built tools for scheduling and grading
Fee Management: Implemented secure payment processing
Communication: Integrated messaging for instant updates
outcome: Reduced administrative workload through automation
Enhanced communication between stakeholders
Improved attendance and fee management efficiency

xlconnect.title: XLConnect
xlconnect.subtitle: Empowering Collaboration and Communication
xlconnect.overview: XLConnect is a cutting-edge collaboration platform designed to enhance the learning experience for students and educators through seamless communication and resource sharing.
xlconnect.role: As the lead developer, I architected the real-time collaboration platform using Socket.IO for instant messaging and notifications. I implemented secure file sharing capabilities and developed the group project management system.
features: Real-time Communication: Implemented instant messaging and notifications
Resource Sharing: Developed tools for seamless content sharing
Group Projects: Created collaborative workspace features
Personalization: Built customizable learning environments
Security: Implemented robust privacy and security measures
outcome: Enhanced collaboration between students and educators
Improved communication and project management
Created a secure environment for educational content

xlcourierdriver.title: XLCourier Driver
xlcourierdriver.subtitle: On-Demand Courier Delivery Application
xlcourierdriver.overview: XLCourier Driver is an innovative on-demand courier delivery application that streamlines the delivery process for courier drivers and enhances the overall delivery experience.
xlcourierdriver.role: As the lead developer, I designed and implemented the driver's application with real-time GPS tracking and route optimization. I developed the digital signature system for delivery confirmation and created the job history tracking feature.
features: Driver Registration: Implemented streamlined onboarding process
Delivery Management: Created request acceptance/rejection system
Location Tracking: Integrated real-time GPS tracking
Digital Signatures: Developed secure delivery confirmation
Job History: Built comprehensive delivery tracking
outcome: Improved delivery efficiency with real-time tracking
Streamlined courier registration process
Enhanced delivery accountability and tracking

xlrideshare.title: XLRideshare
xlrideshare.subtitle: Fast, Easy, and Cost-Effective Travel
xlrideshare.overview: XLRideshare is a comprehensive ride-sharing platform that makes travel fast, easy, and cost-effective through innovative ride-sharing solutions.
xlrideshare.role: As the lead developer, I architected the ride-sharing platform with dual-mode functionality for passengers and drivers. I implemented real-time GPS tracking and route optimization, and developed the fare calculation system.
features: Dual Mode: Implemented passenger and driver mode switching
Ride Options: Created private rides and standard taxi booking
Cost Optimization: Developed ride-sharing algorithms
Payment Integration: Built secure payment processing
Rating System: Implemented user feedback mechanism
outcome: Reduced travel costs through ride-sharing
Improved driver earnings opportunities
Enhanced user experience with multiple ride options

satsang.title: Satsang
satsang.subtitle: A Path to Spiritual Enlightenment
satsang.overview: Satsang is a spiritual application that provides access to devotional content, scriptures, and teachings to help users lead a principled life based on spiritual wisdom.
satsang.role: As the lead developer, I designed and developed the spiritual content delivery platform. I implemented the streaming system for devotional content, created the offline content management system, and developed the digital library for scriptures and magazines.
features: Content Library: Developed access to Katha and Kirtans
Scripture Access: Created digital library of sacred texts
Magazine Integration: Implemented monthly spiritual publications
Video Content: Built streaming for devotional videos
Offline Access: Developed content download capabilities
outcome: Enhanced spiritual engagement for devotees
Improved access to religious content
Created a platform for spiritual growth
